cancel.title: Would you like to cancel writing?
cancel.desc: *If canceled, all written content will be deleted.

permission.title:
Allow notifications
and receive alerts when a question arrives.

noti.question: A new question has arrived. Please join {{name}} on the farewell journey.

welcome.first:
To you who miss your pet that left first.

Our friend is preparing to cross the rainbow bridge by train,
carrying the memories you shared.
welcome.second:
For our precious friend to complete
the train journey beyond the rainbow bridge,
we need your warm heart here on Earth.
welcome.third:
Here, we can revisit memories,
share our feelings, and send letters.

Are you ready to join our friend on their final journey?

start.content:
I'm Popo, the conductor of the Neomeo train.

This train departs from Earth and heads beyond the rainbow bridge.

Please let us know about our friend for the check-in process.

name.title: Who am I to my pet?
name.caption: Up to 10 characters in Korean or English.

name.title: What is your pet's name?
name.caption: Up to 10 characters in Korean or English.

kind.title: What kind of companion is your pet?

complete.content:
Check-in is complete.

Now, {{name}} will cross the rainbow bridge
just as you remember them.

We will safely escort them to {{star}}.

question.question: Q&A
question.placeholder: No answers have been written yet.
question.remain: There are {{count}} questions left until arrival at {{star}}.

complete.title: Would you like to save the answer you wrote?

question.complete:
Thanks to your answer, the train is departing for the next station!
How about continuing by sharing your honest feelings
and writing a heartfelt letter?

list.label: Answer Journey
list.desc:
You have answered N questions so far.
Shall we take a look at your journey of answers?
list.title: Rainbow Bridge-Neomeo Train
list.caption: This train goes from Earth to {{star}}.

first.title: Answer from the heart
first.desc:
Write answers to the daily questions.
Revisit memories with {{name}} through 49 questions.

second.title: Answers accumulate step by step
second.desc:
You can check your answers in the answer list.
Your precious answers help the train carrying {{name}} depart.

third.title: So we can arrive safely at {{star}}
third.desc:
To help the train carrying {{name}} arrive safely at {{star}},
why not answer the questions with a warm heart?

diary.title: Share with the wind
diary.desc: Put here any feelings you haven't been able to tell anyone.

write.guide: Feel free to share whatever you want to say, whatever you're thinking, any lingering feelings. Be honest about your feelings.

complete.title: Have you shared everything honestly?
complete.desc: The story you wrote will fly away into the sky.

diary.complete:
What you've shared has flown away into the sky.
Hope you spend today with a bit lighter heart.

first.title: Don't keep it bottled up, let it out
first.desc:
Whatever you wanted to say or think, any lingering feelings you haven't expressed yet.
Feel free to share them openly here.

second.title: A bamboo forest whispering in the wind
second.desc:
The wind will carry your story into the sky.
It will disappear without a trace, so feel free to let it all out.

sealing.label: Choose a seal to close your letter.

letter.complete:
Thank you for writing the letter so sincerely!
The letter will be carefully delivered to {{name}} on the train.

first.title: Express your sincerity anytime, anywhere
first.desc:
Whenever you think of your precious {{name}},
write them a letter filled with your heartfelt feelings.

second.title: Seal it carefully and deliver it
second.desc:
When you finish writing the letter, choose a sealing wax.
We'll seal your precious letter with the chosen wax.

third.title: A letter sent into the sky
third.desc:
Your sealed letter will be sent to {{name}} on the train.
Shall we go write a letter to {{name}} now?

ending.title: We have safely arrived at {{star}}.
ending.content:
While you were answering questions, the train carrying {{name}} arrived at {{star}}.
{{name}} will stay here and wait for {{user}}.
Until the day you meet again, we hope you cherish the memories with {{name}}.

question.label: New Question Alert
question.desc: An alert will ring every day at 22:00!
